term.title: phase interaction

item.text: Molecular interaction between the components present in the interphases of a multiphase mixture.

notes.item: The interphase elasticity is the capability of a deformed interphase to return to its original dimensions after the force causing the deformation has been removed.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1985. 'Definition of terms related to polymer blends, composites, and multiphase polymeric materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2004)' on page 2002 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476111985)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
